text: Frederic William Stanfield (May 4, 1944 â€“ September 13, 2021) was a Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He played 14 seasons in the National Hockey League from 1964 until 1978. He won two Stanley Cups with the Boston Bruins, in 1970 and 1972. He was born in Toronto, Ontario. Stanfield played for the Chicago Black Hawks, Boston Bruins, Minnesota North Stars and the Buffalo Sabres. Stanfield died on September 13, 2021 in Buffalo, New York at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Minnesota North Stars players Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Stanley Cup champions
title: Fred Stanfield
